description: The function that will be called when the <%=doc_class_name%> interacts with another <%=entity%> and registers a successful hit.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.desc: The <%=doc_class_name%> that will be executing the <%=card_action%>.

parameters.name: other
parameters.desc: The <%=entity%> that was hit by this <%=doc_class_name%>.
